entry.title: I knew you were trouble
entry.summary:
Author: norman123

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,549Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 77

Summary: Derek has never been particularly interested in Peter’s personal life, but when his uncle returns from Canada with a new "husband," he realizes—this is a disaster.Stiles is too loud, too bold, and far too good at getting in his way.Derek is certain that there’s something off about this "marriage," but the more he watches Stiles, the harder it becomes to ignore that anger isn’t the only thing he feels.What if he isn’t furious because Stiles became part of their family—but because he didn’t become part of his life?

entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,086Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 273

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.

entry.title: A Second Chance
entry.summary:
Author: Romantific

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,804Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 1

Summary: While working for the FBI Melinda Stilinski (Fem Stiles) gets the call that Derek is dead. In a fit of Grief she rushes home to Beacon Hills and finds herself at the Nemeton where she is offered a choice. Will that choice be enough to fix the future? Tune in to find out. (Aged up Stiles Stilinski. Melinda is 17 not 16. Also Aged down Derek, he’s going to be 20) time-travel.

entry.title: Guided by a Beating Heart
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,665Chapters: 54/54Kudos: 66

Summary: (Further continuation of Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU)After defeating their second Goa'uld System Lord in less than a year, the residents of Beacon Hills must adapt to their ever-changing world.Cora Hale has broken the family curse, but now she must continue her work of rehabilitating the Hale-Littlefield Pack while keeping Beacon Hills safe for all its residents.Stiles Stilinski continues his journey of recovery and self-discovery after his possession.Derek Hale faces new challenges as he starts going on offworld missions through the Stargate.

entry.title: Renaissance in ruins
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,737Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 91

Summary: Stiles returns to Beacon Hills after years of disappearance. He brings with him a child, but something is different. His presence is marked by a silent pain, a weight that the pack can't ignore.Derek quickly notices that Stiles is no longer the same. There’s something in his behavior, in his gaze, that hides a dark past. But what happened to him? What is he trying to hide?The pack, still hurt by Stiles' sudden departure, doesn’t know how to deal with his return. Stiles’ secrets begin to surface, and with them, a truth no one expected.And, in the midst of it all, Derek starts to wonder: is what happened to Stiles something that can be healed? Or is he already lost forever?

entry.summary:
Author: our_sin

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,939Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 1,054

Summary: “You know for how many times you’ve had to deal with this recently, you would think you would know that running never gets you anywhere. I am sorry about how I look at the moment but it sadly comes with the job.”   “Y-You’re supposed to be gone. Scott gave you the bite, you- you aren’t supposed to be here.”   “You cannot get rid of something you were born with.”Or: Void's back but he seems less violent, less dangerous. entry.title: They May Have Fallen But We Still Stand
entry.summary:
Author: Effra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,716Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 14

Summary: It’s the end of the war and to Lieutenant Stiles Stilinski, it feels as if everyone is celebrating except for him. Perhaps it is the faces that swim behind his eyelids, lost to time and musket balls. Or perhaps it is the doubt he harbours in his heart that he can truly be good at anything but soldiering.Regardless, he huddles at one end of the bar, nursing an ale barely worth the name and listening while the locals sing their songs and toast to fallen soldiers. He doesn't think about the men lost from his own rifle regiment, and he definitely doesn't think about alpha Lord Hale of Triskele, last seen leaping into battle with typical reckless heroism. Because even if he had survived the battle, nothing could or would ever happen between them. They were from two different worlds.

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,670Chapters: 6/8Kudos: 309

Summary: Stiles and Derek meet on an online forum for the Supernatural community.A year later, Derek surprises Stiles by traveling to Beacon Hills, his pack in tow.
